name: Baby's First Turing Machine
body:
# What is Baby's First Turing Machine?

This software is a Turing Machine simulator written in Java. The software is available for any platform with Java VM. It's also open source - you can find the code here on GitHub [here](https://github.com/ayrtonmassey/Turing-Simulator/).

# Where can I get it?

A download link will be made available on this page when the software is complete.

# I need help!

Sorry, the documentation hasn't been written yet!
tagline: A Turing Simulator for the Heriot-Watt Programming Challenge
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
